title: Menu
description: Discover our culinary creations. Our menu changes with the seasons and is made with the best local ingredients.

seo.title: Menu - BASE Restaurant and Bar
seo.description: Explore our menu at BASE. From street food classics to innovative cocktails, there's something for everyone.

food.title: Food
food.description: Explore our food menu at BASE. From street food classics to gourmet dishes, enjoy our chef's special creations.

drinks.title: Drinks
drinks.description: Explore our drinks menu at BASE. From craft cocktails to fine wines and specialty coffees.

foodMenu.title: Food Menu
foodMenu.subtitle: Discover our delicious food menu. From starters to desserts, we offer a variety of dishes to satisfy your taste buds.
foodMenu.pageDescription: Explore our food menu featuring locally sourced ingredients prepared with creativity and passion.

drinksMenu.title: Drinks Menu
drinksMenu.subtitle: Explore our carefully selected drinks menu featuring craft cocktails, fine wines, and specialty drinks.
drinksMenu.pageDescription: Discover our selection of craft cocktails, wines, beers and non-alcoholic options at BASE.
